extendedInfo.description: **a Gizmodo App of the Day****On of the "Best New Android Apps From The Last 3 Weeks" (2/23/13 - 3/12/13)**Get your family and home ready for a tornado. The American Red Cross tornado app is the complete solution you need to understand and prepare for a tornado and all that comes with it. With interactive quizzes and simple step-by-step advice itâs never been easier to be ready!Features:â¢ Audible siren when NOAA issues a Tornado warning for any of your monitored locations letting you know when itâs time to go to your safe room plus an all-clear alert when the warning expires (Note: Alerts' sounds will NOT override if phone is on vibrate or in sleep mode)â¢ Simple step-by-step instructions to help you know what-to-do even if the cell towers and TVs are down. Prioritized actions for before, during, and after requires no mobile connectivity â¢ Help distant friends and family in tornado alley with ability to receive tornado watch and warning alerts based on their location from NOAA â¢ Red Cross location-based open shelters map for when you need it most â¢ Be ready should a tornado hit by learning how to assemble an emergency kit for your family in the event of power outage or evacuation â¢ Reduce your householdâs stress and anxiety should a tornado hit by learning to make and practice an emergency plan â¢ Interactive quizzes allow you to earn badges that you can share with your friends and show off your tornado knowledge â¢ Know how many tornadoes have occurred in your area â¢ Know the difference between a watch and a warningâ¢ Learn how to deal with food and water impacted by floods and power outages â¢ Simply let friends/family know youâre safe with customizable âIâm Safeâ notification sharable thru social media, text and email â¢ Let others know where you are with the Toolkitâs strobe light, flashlight and audible alert functions

reviews.title: Great to have
reviews.comment: Awesome alerts, siren sounds, first aid & what to have in your emergency preparedness kit. All great to have plus the siren alerts are nice too. Get it you\'ll love it.
reviews.author: Daniel Seel

reviews.title: Didn\'t work when needed most
reviews.comment: Despite multiple tornado watches and warnings in my area, the app failed to notify me of any of them.  Was really excited about this app when I heard about it, but very disappointed with its performance when I needed it most.
reviews.author: John Little

reviews.title: Great!!!  (Va)
reviews.comment: Luv this app!! Gave me alerts in Fla. where my dad is. Called immediately everyone was prepared. Everything turned out fine.
reviews.author: Karyn W

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: TS Andrea visited today.  Tornado app was great.  Got watches and warnings all day.  The warning siren got attention!  Monitored my location and my kids college.  Super for Android Galaxy Note 2.
reviews.author: Jim McDede

reviews.title: Just what it says, nothing extra.
reviews.comment: I am surprised that Flash Flood Warnings and Areal Flood Warnings are not included, (the NWS uses the word Areal).  I am sure the American Red Cross knows that flooding kills more people than tornadoes do.
reviews.author: Kevin Pierce

reviews.title: Tornado
reviews.comment: Severe thunderstorm alerts are three minutes behind the National Weather Service I have timed these. Just hope the tornado warnings are not late a lot of peoples lives would be at stake.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: In a area with several tornado on ground. I get no alerts.  Tried to go in an add my location and it will not see my current location and says it cant find my location when i put in my zip.   A live saving app that does not work when needed.
reviews.author: Chris M

reviews.title: Not accurate
reviews.comment: This app is alerting me what\'s going on on the other side of the state. I will stick with abc 33/40 app to alert me for when the weather gets closer to me not 3 hrs away.
reviews.author: Jason Boatman

reviews.title: Use a better app
reviews.comment: Tornado warnings all night in Maryland Heights MO, 63043. Not one Notification from the tornado app, well except for one severe thunderstorm warning. Good thing I had the local channel app installed, it notified me multiple times. Tornado app that doesn\'t warn of tornadoes? What\'s the point? Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Andy Luebbers

reviews.title: Alerts and location
reviews.comment: Its a great app. It makes me feel better especially when im at work n they r at school during a storm. The location needs work and the radar!!!
reviews.author: Renee Hernandez

reviews.title: Must have!
reviews.comment: This is a must have app if you live in an area where natueal disasters are a possibility.  If for no other reason get it just for the \"I\'m okay\" feature in case you are in an area where public safety has been compromised and you want your loved ones to know you are safe.
reviews.author: Michael VanDeMark

reviews.title: Boost ZTE
reviews.comment: I have heard wonderful rhings about this app but every time i go to open it it say theres an error and i have to report it or force close... please fix asap!
reviews.author: Amanda Chaney

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love this app. Not only is it quicker on the alerts but the tornado siren is an amazing feature. Gave me a small heart attack but caught my attention.  Two thumbs up :)
reviews.author: Sarah Laatsch

reviews.title: Keeps crashing
reviews.comment: I have not been able to open this app since may 2nd no updates available PLEASE fix.
reviews.author: Julie Barton

reviews.comment: Great tool, don\'t wait until after a disaster to download it.  Do it now and go through the app to be better prepared before the next storm.
reviews.author: Chris McGreevy

reviews.title: Still needs work.
reviews.comment: It still can\'t distinguish between Johnson county, IA and Johnson county, IN.  Kind of the app that cried wolf.
reviews.author: Kevin Crawley

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: If you live in an area that has had tornadoes or bad storms, you need this! I live in an area prone to having very bad storms and this app helps me stay prepared in the case of an emergency. Love it!
reviews.author: Kara Parent

reviews.title: Bugs
reviews.comment: What!?!?! Got severe tornado go through area and app NEVER went off?!?! Had no idea until family 3 states away called. Need to fix bugs pronto!
reviews.author: Kathrine Vigil

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: The red cross is super close to my house but I got this as back up.  Kept me really busy. Thanks for all the little gifts. Really opened my eyes. Enjoy my PLAN.
reviews.author: HALEY SLAUGHTER

reviews.title: More Than Excellent
reviews.comment: If a possible tornado is in an area you specify, this app will give warning. Full details of the alert are available to read.  Red Cross Tornado app has consistently given warning faster than any weather app. This is a useful tool to help one be alert to severe weather issues anywhere in the lower 48. One can notify one\'s safety for other\'s peace-of-mind using this app. The app is free to download & use.
reviews.author: Patricia ONeal
